meeting_info.organization: Tax Increment Financing Reinvestment Zone Number Seventeen Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
Angela Hardiman, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Call to order and Introduction of meeting participants
Nomination and election of a Temporary Chair
agenda_items.description: Nomination and election of Temporary Chair

agenda_items.title: Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 through 9
Nomination and election of a Vice Chair
agenda_items.description: Nomination and election of a Vice Chair

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the January 23, 2024 TOD TIF District Board Meeting
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a request by Trammell Crow Company Development, LLC
agenda_items.description: Request for an extension of material dates and deadlines by twelve (12) months and minor modifications including a reduction in the required minimum leasable residential space from 340,000 square feet to 325,000 square feet and updated design elements for the Mockingbird Station East mixed-income and transit-oriented development project.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to the Director of the Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a request by the Cityâ€™s Department of Transportation and Public Works (TPW)
agenda_items.description: Request for TIF district funding in an amount not to exceed $1,670,700 for construction of public infrastructure improvements.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to the City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the TOD TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024
agenda_items.presenter: Angela Hardiman, District Manager, Office of Economic Development, Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to the City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a regular meeting schedule for the TOD TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2025
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

financial_items.description: Funding request for construction of public infrastructure improvements
